document.description: This is a chain fast food restaurant, but it is better than most, especially if ... only one type of food (such as tacos, flautas, etc.) or a limited selection of foods ...
document.body:
Mexican Food Ratings by City
A Review of Restaurants Tried
Important Notice: Steve's Gastronomic Home Page has moved to okgourmet.com , and any new reviews or updates can be found on the new web site.
